utter_faq/1.text: LMS stands for Learning Management System

utter_faq/2.text: LMS helps to develop the skill of the students and evaluates them based on coding skills and consistency

utter_faq/3.text: Students from 1st yr to final yr can join, and even people eager to learn are eligible.

utter_faq/4.text: We have implemented a very effective way to monitor the students regarding malpractise.Plagiarism meter, disabled taking screenshot, etc.

utter_faq/5.text: There are 3 logins: Student login, Staff login, Admin Login

utter_faq/6.text: Staff can suspend or give warning students if they are involved in malpractise, or if he/she is absent for a long time.
